title: Strengthening Business Strategy Practical Competencies: Blended Learning Program for Integrated Business English Education

context.prior_knowledge: Advanced theoretical knowledge and mastery of high-level application skills
context.additional_context: Practical Competency Enhancement Program for Corporate Management/HR Professionals

learning_goals: Learners enhance their ability to write practical business emails through case analyses based on real-world business scenarios.
Learners participate in weekly online discussion activities and accurately utilize over 80% of key expressions required for business negotiations.
Learners master 200 essential vocabulary items in specialized fields via mobile learning modules and achieve scores of 70% or higher on assessment exams.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
